name: AMC (American Mathematics Competitions)
summary: US middle and high school examinations. THe competition is divided in three levels AMC 8, AMC 10, AMC 12 for students below 14, 16 and 18 years old.
size: 25 multiple-choice questions per year per level.
download: Various formatted datasets based on historical AMC questions are available, e.g., https://huggingface.co/datasets/AI-MO/aimo-validation-amc.
notes: The competition lasts 75 minutes for levels 10 and 12, 40 minutes for level 8.
